responses.rationale: The segment describes factual events (infections, culling numbers) without using intensifiers or comparatives modifying risk adjectives.
The segment provides factual data on bird culling numbers across the nation without using intensifiers or comparatives modifying risk adjectives.
The segment provides factual data on bird culling numbers in Iowa without using intensifiers or comparatives modifying risk adjectives.
The segment provides factual background information about Iowa's egg production without using intensifiers or comparatives modifying risk adjectives.
The segment provides factual background information about Iowa's turkey production without using intensifiers or comparatives modifying risk adjectives.
The segment reports the location of the latest cases factually without using intensifiers or comparatives modifying risk adjectives.
The segment reports a confirmed case factually without using intensifiers or comparatives modifying risk adjectives.
The segment contains the intensifier 'so' directly modifying the risk adjective 'infectious'.
The segment provides factual data on the number of states with confirmed cases without using intensifiers or comparatives modifying risk adjectives.
The segment describes the likely cause of spread factually without using intensifiers or comparatives modifying risk adjectives.
